_.comment: Text color for danger actions or messages (red.60).

strong.comment: Strong text color for neutral elements (gray.70).

stronger.comment: Stronger text color for neutral elements (gray.80).

strongest.comment: Strongest text color for neutral elements (gray.90).

weak.comment: Weak text color for neutral elements (gray.40).

_.comment: Text color for primary actions or messages (blue.60).

strong.comment: Strong text color for primary actions or messages (blue.70).

stronger.comment: Stronger text color for primary actions or messages (blue.80).

strongest.comment: Strongest text color for primary actions or messages (blue.90).

_.comment: Text color for success actions or messages (green.60).
Text color for warning actions or messages (yellow.60).
